name: state-management-benchmark
description: Professional state management benchmark suite using Vitest Bench

scripts.benchmark:all-groups: npm run benchmark:read && npm run benchmark:write && npm run benchmark:creation && npm run benchmark:async && npm run benchmark:complexity && npm run benchmark:memory && npm run benchmark:form && npm run benchmark:cache
scripts.benchmark:all-scales: npm run benchmark:read && npm run benchmark:read-x1000 && npm run benchmark:write && npm run benchmark:write-x1000 && npm run benchmark:creation && npm run benchmark:async && npm run benchmark:complexity && npm run benchmark:memory && npm run benchmark:form && npm run benchmark:cache
scripts.clean: rm -rf results && rm -rf groups/*/results.json && mkdir -p results
